text:
Created attachment 26246
Test buildfile for all 4 configurations

By two-level hierarchy, I means a "child" buildfile including (resp importing) a "parent" buildfile that is also including (resp importing) a "grandfather" buildfile.

Two-level  double-include or double-import hierarchies both work fine, but as soon as I try to mix inclusion method, ANT complains about missing targets.

See attachment to reproduce.

Regards
creator: efe4itcc@gmail.com
